title: Limit and colimit of presheaves
summary: In category theory, a branch of mathematics, a limit or a colimit of presheaves on a category C is a limit or colimit in the functor category C ^ = F c t ( C op , S e t ) {\displaystyle {\widehat {C}}=\mathbf {Fct} (C^{\text{op}},\mathbf {Set} )} .[1]
